name: The Body of a Notable Enemy

description.value:
The Head of an enemy, the skull of a Saint, the skin of a Sinner, etc. Can be used both in the rituals of dark gods and Imperial Holy Relics, depending on the presentation.

Requirements

Either Heretical or not depending on the body in question.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
description.summary: The Head of an enemy, the skull of a Saint, the skin of a Sinner, etc. Can be used both in the rituals of dark gods and Imperial Holy Relics, depending on the presentation.
